comments.body: how do versionedAPIPath and config.GroupVersion interact?
hmm, I guess that's pre-existing. still weird.

Yeah, I refrained from fixing that.  RESTClients don't assume group version matches versionedAPIPath today, since construction of versionedAPIPath can depend on the group in some of the existing code (core).

Also because RESTClient exposes `GroupVersion()` and `Request#VersionedParams` needs it.

I'll add a comment to ClientContentConfig to that effect.
